summary: The diff implements a comprehensive Half-Life HUD system with multiple faction-specific tabs, custom faction themes, backend state management, error boundaries, and audio player functionality. However, many detailed requirements remain unimplemented or only partially addressed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Cinematic boot sequence with Lambda logo animation featuring particle system, glow effects, system initialization text scrolling
missing_requirements.reason: BootSequenceOverlay.tsx exists but the diff is truncated. Cannot verify particle system, glow effects, or all initialization text stages are implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Main tab displaying suit power consumption graph
missing_requirements.reason: MainTab.tsx shows health, armor, aux power, ammo, and environmental hazards, but no evidence of suit power consumption graph component.

missing_requirements.requirement: Tactical tab with simplified radar/map, zone control map showing faction territories, and complete communication log
missing_requirements.reason: TacticalTab.tsx only imports RadarPanel, ThreatAssessmentPanel, and MissionBriefingDisplay. No evidence of zone control map, inventory system, tactical equipment status, or communication log components.

missing_requirements.requirement: Medical tab with health regeneration rate calculator, stimulant/enhancement status, biometric authentication status, quarantine protocols, and prognosis with recommended treatment actions
missing_requirements.reason: MedicalTab.tsx is truncated. Cannot verify if all medical features are implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Overwatch Command tab for Combine faction with citizen suppression metrics, resistance activity tracking, transhuman forces deployment, Civil Protection directives, Breencast propaganda feeds, portal storm monitoring
missing_requirements.reason: No OverwatchCommandTab.tsx file found in added or modified files. Only ResearchLabTab, CommandBriefingTab, and FacilityMonitoringTab are present.

missing_requirements.requirement: Arsenal tab with 3D wireframe or schematic visualizations for each weapon
missing_requirements.reason: ArsenalTab.tsx is truncated. Cannot confirm whether weapon schematics, comparison tool, ammo conservation tips, and maintenance status are implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Utilities tab with custom music file upload via drag-and-drop or file browser, track selection dropdown, playlist management add/remove/reorder, and H.E.V Mark Selector Mark I-V with stats
missing_requirements.reason: MiniAudioPlayer.tsx shows basic controls but no upload, playlist management, or drag-and-drop. UtilitiesTab.tsx truncated - cannot verify Mark Selector or full audio system implementation.

missing_requirements.requirement: System log with export log functionality and auto-scroll with pause option
missing_requirements.reason: No system log component file visible in diff. SystemLogView mentioned in frontend-file-summaries.txt but not in added/modified files, and export/pause features not confirmed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Operator console supporting all listed commands with command history navigation
missing_requirements.reason: CommandConsole component mentioned in frontend-file-summaries.txt but file not in diff. Cannot verify all 17 commands are implemented with feedback and arrow key navigation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Half-Life themed visual polish including Vortigaunt energy readings, hazard course training mode toggle, Xen border world visual effects, headcrab warning indicators, Combine scanner drone detection alerts, and G-Man Easter egg
missing_requirements.reason: Lambda styling and Geiger counter mentioned but no evidence of Vortigaunt effects, hazard course mode, Xen effects, headcrab warnings, scanner alerts, or G-Man silhouette glitch.

missing_requirements.requirement: Mobile optimization with gesture controls, bottom navigation bar, hardware acceleration for 60fps animations, and service worker for offline functionality
missing_requirements.reason: Service worker registration exists in App.tsx, but no evidence of swipe gestures, pinch to zoom, bottom navigation bar, or hardware acceleration configuration in CSS.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module created despite BuildRequest constraint stating only generate backend/migration.mo when upgrading existing state structures
hallucinated_features.reason: backend/migration.mo was added with empty migration logic, but BuildRequest explicitly states migration should only be generated when upgrading existing state structures. This is a new build, not an upgrade.

hallucinated_features.description: FactionSwitchOverlay component not requested in any requirement
hallucinated_features.reason: App.tsx imports and renders FactionSwitchOverlay during faction switching, but no requirement specifies a separate faction switch overlay animation.
